articles.title: TikTok overtakes FB as most world's most downloaded app - Daijiworld.com
articles.description:
Beijing, Aug 10 (IANS): Chinese short-video platform TikTok has overtaken Facebook as the most downloaded social media app in the world, the media reported.
According to Nikkei Asia, a global survey of downloads in 2020 showed TikTok on top of the list of so…
